oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certified Organic Agriculture: Policy Instrument for Sustainable Development?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egelyng, Henrik
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article analyse Certified Organic Agriculture as a proxy for Policy Instruments for Sustainable Development.
